page.title: 11MUSIC
page.content:
{Lee Spencer age 9
I like to listen to{pop music. Pop {music}is music played by groups of people with musical accompaniment.Some group have names i.e.{Wham.}You can listen to music on tap recorders.Tape recorders are boxes wih a hatch.A tape is a plastic case with some tape inside.You can also listen to music on a record player.In the record player you put a disk.It has lots lines on it.You can also listen to music on a radio.This is a box with wires. It picks up signals and turns them into music.There are other groups i.e. {Duran Duran, Culture Club, and Spandau {Ballet. }
